data.subject: Lora Info
data.question: What nodes are included in the lora-info repository?
data.answer: The lora-info repository includes 2 nodes: Lora Info and Image From URL.

data.subject: Installation
data.question: What are the different methods to install lora-info in ComfyUI?
data.answer: There are three methods to install lora-info in ComfyUI: 1. Open ComfyUI Manager, search for 'lorainfo', or 'jitcoder', and click install. 2. Inside ComfyUI/custom-nodes, use `git clone https://github.com/jitcoder/lora-info.git`. 3. Download this repo as a zip and extract it in the custom-nodes directory.

data.subject: Lora Info
data.question: What information does the Lora Info node provide?
data.answer: The Lora Info node shows Lora Base Model, Trigger Words, and Examples.

data.subject: Lora Info
data.question: Who contributed to the development of the Lora Info node?
data.answer: Special thanks go to `badjeff` for doing all the actual hard work (https://github.com/badjeff/comfyui_lora_tag_loader) and `alessandroperilli` for all the feedback.

data.subject: Lora Info
data.question: Is there a preview image available for the Lora Info node?
data.answer: Yes, a preview image is available at the end of the section titled 'Lora Info'.

data.subject: Image From URL
data.question: What does the Image From URL node do?
data.answer: The Image From URL node loads an image from a URL and makes it available for use in your workflow.

data.subject: Image From URL
data.question: Why is the Image From URL node useful in sharing workflows?
data.answer: The Image From URL node is useful in sharing workflows because it allows users to load images from a URL, making it easier for them to use the workflow instead of having to download images separately.

data.subject: Image From URL
data.question: Is there a preview image available for the Image From URL node?
data.answer: Yes, a preview image is available at the end of the section titled 'Image From URL'.
